markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" />10 minutes (command, envision, Interact);     **Effect** By touching the _witchwyrd beacon_ and focusing on it for 10 minutes, you attune yourself to it. Up to four creatures can be attuned to a single _witchwyrd beacon_ at any one time—to attune another creature, one of the previous four must become unattuned. You can break your attunement to a _witchwyrd beacon_ by Dismissing the effect. The attunement automatically ends if the attuned creature dies or if the attuned creature attunes themselves to a different _witchwyrd beacon_. The effect can also be dispelled normally. You can sense whenever the _witchwyrd beacon_ you are attuned to is activated in any way.
